remarks:
A variable elimination law for equality with no distinct variable requirements.  (Compare ~ equvini .)  (Contributed by NM, 1-Mar-2013.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 17-Oct-2016.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 15-Jun-2019.) 

---

 A variable elimination law for equality with no distinct variable requirements.  (Compare ~ equvini .)  (Contributed by NM, 1-Mar-2013.) (Revised by NM, 3-Feb-2015.)
statement: equveli $p |- ( A. z ( z = x <-> z = y ) -> x = y ) $.
